sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Card, CardBody} from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './tour-card.css'; const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id, title, city, photo, price, featured, reviews} = tour const totalRating = reviews?.reduce((acc,item) => acc + item.rating, 0) const avgRating = totalRating == 0 ? '' : totalRating == 0 ? totalRating : totalRating / reviews?.length; return
{featured && featured}
{city} {avgRating == 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating == 0} ({reviews.length})
{title}
{price} /per person
} export default TourCard
